author: David
content: I’d never thought I’d say this but Microsoft is my worst stock I’ve ever bought. I bought this stock in March and there isn’t one day where it outperformed the s and p 500

author: Kalpesh from Mars
content: Bullish: It's starting to sink in how 4 years of super economic growth will affect MSFT

author: XX
content: Bullish: 450 by end of year easy

author: mahmood
content: I own Microsoft but I doubt if it passes 450 by end of the year.

author: Ick
content: Bullish: Current wars will end.  American businesses will be going back into Russia.  The Abraham peace cord will start back. Iran will stop building nukes..The middle east will become a huge economic delta..India is growing and will continue.  China must change its human rights positions or it will suffer globally...and MSFT will be huge beyond your imagination.
